item.title: Vandals
item.description: Incidents I got this mixed intuition about recent vandals activation. They happen to act right inside walls of Western public cultural institutions. So I wanted to untangle it. Analysis My intuition (somewhat outsider) sees them as examples of hard deflection from the original Western values. And this deflection happens at the time of bigger challenges and higher-priority issues. And this context makes it look both pathetic in comparison and out of touch too.
